text:
e="preserve">Rodney Litchfield (1939 – 5 September 2020) was an English actor. He was born in Wigan, Lancashire. His career began in 1983. He was known for his role was Wilfred Morton in the television series "Coronation Street". He also played Tommy in "Early Doors".
He also appeared in shows like "Juliet Bravo", "A Touch of Frost", "Cracker", "Hetty Wainthropp Investigates", "Heartbeat", and "Peter Kay's Phoenix Nights".
Litchfield died on 5 September 2020, aged 81.
